song.title: You Never Will Get Out of There Alive
song.info:
Compowinner of newschool music compo at Solskogen 2013
Miss Polly is a dolly She's sweeter than a lolly But to kiss her would be folly 'Cause you're buzzed right off your trolley I wish ??? You're a sheep and she's your collie You never will get out of there alive
And Sandy comes in handy (oh?) When you're feeling slightly randy (aha!) She looks as cute as candy When you're halfway through the brandy The problem is with Sandy (what?) Although you might think it's dandy Is she shares a bed with Mandy (ooh!) And you never will get out of there alive
Woke up naked... that's gonna be expensive
And ??? is a fella Best believe me when I tell ya She's got secrets in the cellar But if that turns your propeller Then you get out there and tell her Do your moves, yeah, Bella But you never will get out of there alive
